item.title: Computer Vision vs. Sensor Fusion: Who Wins the Self-Driving Car Race?
item.description: Tesla’s bold claim that “humans drive with eyes and a brain, so our cars will too” sparked one of the most polarizing debates in autonomous vehicle (AV) technology: Can vision-only systems truly compete with—or even outperform—multi-sensor fusion architectures?
